short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save multiple tabs for later and reopen them with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabNest is a minimalistic, open-source, productivity-boosting Chrome extension designed to enhance multitasking. It allows you to save all the tabs in a window for later use. With just one click, TabNest saves all tabs and groups in the window, then closes itâ€”reducing clutter and freeing up system resources. You can easily access and reopen the saved tabs, making the switch between projects or tasks seamless.

Features:

- Save all open tabs in the current window for later use and close the window.
- Reopen saved tabs in a new window with a single click. TabNest saves and restores the exact tab and group configurations from when they were saved, including group name, color, collapse status, and active tab.
- Update, rename, and delete saved links.
- Sync saved tabs across devices using Chrome account storage.

GitHub: https://github.com/tokedo/TabNest
